bibl.title: The Septuagint as Nomos: How the Torah Became a "Civic Law" for the Jews of Egypt.
bibl.note: Traduction de: La Septante comme nomos. Comment la Torah est devenue "loi civique" pour les Juifs d'Égypte, Annali di Scienze religiose 2 (1997) pp. 143-158.

bibl.title: Critical Studies in Ancient Law, Comparative Law and Legal History

bibl.seg: MODRZEJEWSKI (MÉLÈZE MODRZEJEWSKI) Joseph, The Septuagint as Nomos: How the Torah Became a "Civic Law" for the Jews of Egypt.
John W. CAIRNS and Olivia F. ROBINSON (Edd.), Critical Studies in Ancient Law, Comparative Law and Legal History (Oxford - Portland, Oregon, 2001) pp. 183-199.
Traduction de: La Septante comme nomos. Comment la Torah est devenue "loi civique" pour les Juifs d'Égypte, Annali di Scienze religiose 2 (1997) pp. 143-158.
